data.text: @PlzSolveCFS @timkaine @SenMarkey @TammyDuckworth I'm so glad me/cfs is included after years of broken promises from NIH. It seems the prayers are finally intervening...
@PlzSolveCFS @timkaine @SenMarkey @TammyDuckworth Thank you, Dear Lord! Thank you!
@PlzSolveCFS @timkaine @SenMarkey @TammyDuckworth Thank you, dear Lord! Thank you!
@PlzSolveCFS @timkaine @SenMarkey @TammyDuckworth What a great news, The US Senate gives this assistance and recognition to #MECFS #LongCovid, ...

@PlzSolveCFS @timkaine @SenMarkey @TammyDuckworth Image description: "Solve M.E. Endorses Care For Long Covid Act, introduced by Sen. Tim Kaine (D-Va), Sen. Ed Markey (D-MA), Sen. Tammy Duckworth (D-IL)" Then some text from S-3726 with "myalgic encephalomyelitis/chronic fatigue syndrome and fibromyalgia" highlighted.
#AltText
